errors still cause she has been a disadvantage. Flor sent Love Game finished a strong third game after the break, to establish a 3-1 lead. Fully restricted Peng Shuai then lost serve again, squandered three break points after the failure to win the marathon sixth inning, Peng Shuai has a big deficit to 1-5. Flor obvious advantages did not let up, the end of the fourth disc easily break on a 6-1 head start.Peng Shuai fought back in the second set start to complete the first break, after winning serve to establish a 2-1 lead. Submit Love Game of Flor recover inning, but still rely Peng Shuai serve to defuse the crisis after a break and continue to a 3-1 lead. They followed their own security, Flor 2-4 behind inair jordan 9 retro the face of adversity began to elevate status: Spaniard saved three break points to hold the seventh inning, the game gradually snatch the initiative. Then take advantage of China's Golden unforced errors to complete the back-breaking. After withstand Peng Shuai counterattack, Flor has to 5-4 ahead score. Peng Shuai of mind when faced with chaos non-insurance is not significantly increased pressure mistakes, Flor seize the opportunity to complete the break again to 6-4 last laugh.Flor opponent in the second round of the No. 7 seed Svetlana Kuznetsova. The latter today to face the past three games against Zhang Shuai to win all the time, in the first game to complete the break. Then straight sets to win the four-ball serve, to establish a 2-0 lead. At this time Zhang Shuai gradually into the state, tied the score with a break even under warranty. Kuznetsova hold its ground after the completion of the fifth inning to break again, succeeded in a forehand attack to put the game away 4-2 again. But the tenacious Zhang Shuai did not give up, in the eighth inning to seize the opportunity to decline in the quality of opponents serve again to achieve back-breaking, to chase the score at 4-4. In the ninth inning Kuznetsova critical to enhance state and to do so to achieve the key break. After resisting pressure to hold the ball wins disk Bureau, she was a 6-4 head

start.Yuezhanyueyong start Kuznetsova in the second set and broke serve twice to lead 3-0. Return of the inning breaks Kuznetsova diminished performance, solid after Paul took advantage expanded to 4-0. They tug of war in the fifth inning, Zhang Shuai in squandered five set points and five split after experiencing the test, was eventually re-break. Russian star then won the ball game, Take 6-0 last laugh, the next round.In the other end of the game today, the No. 2 seed Bouchard to 6-4/6-1 eliminated Ke Leiba Nova; Vinci after a three-set battle to beat Cardin 6-2/4-6/6-1 Figure. Rookie Kurumi Nara of Japan to 1-6/6-7 (5) lost to Tony ancient; Hull Koger places 2-6/6-2/6-4 reversed Wojciech Grenoble. In addition to 4-6/0-6 Stosur of Australia SageVision defeat Barcinski, broke a big upset. The Knicks will soon appoint Steve — Cole as the new coach, and now they are actively negotiate withair jordan 1 homme Cole, I hope at the end of the first round of formal and Cole agreed, that is, the new coach will be in five Early took office.According to sources, the new president of the Knicks Phil — Jackson hopes to hire Cole in early May as the first coach after he took office, and currently serve as guest commentator for TNT Cole does not seem to decide whether to formally so fast transition from a commentator on the team coach, but also one of the league's most talked about coach.However, according to sources, in terms of persuading Cole, Jackson has made significant progress, in order to convince former disciple to become head coach directly from the narrator, Jackson made a long job.Cole calls to each other between the Knicks and the news is not news, Cole himself had expressed interest in the team as the head coach, but after the start of the

playoffs, Cole seems to have been in a wait state , and indeed there are other teams interested in him. Sources familiar with NBA coaching sources, the Warriors had to Kohl expressed keen interest, hoping to hire him as coach, but the final choice Cole Jackson still seems to have the league's most famous coach, but also their own mentor players in the side during the escort, which is for Cole has an irresistible appeal.The players period to hand the superb archery bull famous for Cole and he joined the Spurs won the championship five times, in effect during the bull, his coach is Phil Jackson, the triangle offense, he is very familiar with. If Jackson wants to lead this prestigious Runikesi system, Cole is undoubtedly a very good candidate."I know Phil said that there are many common areaschaussure air jordan 5 between us, I think this is very correct," when asked if the Knicks would be introduced if the coach when the triangle offense, Cole said, "We have a lot of the same philosophy and way of thinking, in my basketball thoughts, I learned a lot from him and Wendt (triangle founder) body. ""Can be very sure that there are many of the same ideas can be discussed between us, but if the triangle offense as well as issues specific to this area, I do not want to talk about yet, but there is no doubt, I told Phil has between very close contact, whether it is the idea or are on our relationship, "Clippers owner Donald — Stirling incidents of racial discrimination had a profound impact on previously reported, said Magic Johnson and his business partner interested in acquiring the Clippers, but the magician himself denied the report, he wrote on his Twitter to clarify that he does not want to acquire the Clippers."NBA fans, I want to let this rumor stop, I myself did not want to buy the Clippers, who have the boss."
